com.facebook.litho.annotations

Annotation Type PropDefault


  • @Retention(value=CLASS)
public @interface PropDefault
    PropDefault can be used for setting the default value of an optional Prop in a LayoutSpec or MountSpec. The field must be a constant (i.e. static final) with the same name and type as the Prop.

    For example: 

     @LayoutSpec
 class SomeSpec {

   @PropDefault
   static final String name = "John Doe";  // default value for name

   @OnCreateLayout
   static Component onCreateLayout(
     ComponentContext c,
     @Prop(optional = true) String name) {

     return Text.create(c)
       .text(title.getTitle())
       .textSizeSp(16)
       .marginDip(YogaEdge.BOTTOM, 4)
       .build();
   }
 }

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int resId
      Sets an Android resource as the default value of the Prop.
      ResType resType
      Declares that the default value must be a resource of the specified ResType.

    • Element Detail

      • resType

        public abstract ResType resType
        Declares that the default value must be a resource of the specified ResType.

        For example: 

         @LayoutSpec
 class SomeSpec {

   @PropDefault(resType = ResType.STRING, resId = R.string.default_name)
   static final String name = null;

 }
        Returns:
        A valid resource type.
        Default:
        com.facebook.litho.annotations.ResType.NONE

      • resId

        public abstract int resId
        Sets an Android resource as the default value of the Prop.
        Returns:
        An Android resource id.
        Default:
        0
